locations.name: Hanoi
locations.description: Vietnam's captivating capital, the starting point of the tour, known for its Old Quarter, Hoan Kiem Lake, and rich cultural heritage.

locations.name: Hoi An
locations.description: A magical UNESCO World Heritage town in Central Vietnam, famed for its preserved ancient town, lanterns, and riverside charm.

locations.name: Con Dao
locations.description: A remote archipelago and protected national park known for its pristine beaches, clear waters, and tranquil, off-the-beaten-path atmosphere.
